content.text:
# 6th Canadian Folk Music Awards

-->
| location       = Pantages Playhouse Theatre Winnipeg, Manitoba
| country        = Canada
| reward         =
| year           =
| year2          =
| holder         =
| website        = [http://folkawards.ca/ folkawards.ca]

The 6th Canadian Folk Music Awards were held on November 20, 2010, at the Pantages Playhouse Theatre in Winnipeg, Manitoba.
Nominees and recipients
Recipients are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable width="100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Contemporary Album
|-
| valign="top" |

* Foggy Hogtown Boys - Scotch and Sofa
* David Francey & Mike Ford - Seaway
* The Sojourners - The Sojourners
| valign="top" |
* 'John Wort Hannam - Queen's Hotel'
* Amelia Curran - Hunter, Hunter
* Dala - Girls from the North Country
* Lennie Gallant - If We Had A Fire / Le coeur hante
* Old Man Luedecke - My Hands Are On Fire And Other Love Songs
|-
